## KVConnector.keys() method

Fetch all keys

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
keys?(modelClass: Class<Entity>, options?: Options): Promise<string[]>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  modelClass | <code>Class&lt;Entity&gt;</code> | Model class |
|  options | <code>Options</code> | Options for the operation |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Promise<string[]>`

A promise of an array of keys for all entries
